stanza.line: Who is it that says most which can saymore
Than this rich praise that you alone areyou
In whose confine immured is thestore
Which should example where your equalgrew
Lean penury within that pen dothdwell
That to his subject lends not some smallglory
But he that writes of you if he cantell
That you are you so dignifies hisstory
Let him but copy what in you iswrit
Not making worse what nature made so clear
And such a counterpart shall fame hiswit
You to your beauteous blessings add acurse
Being fond on praise which makes your praisesworse
